explanation: If Q = \(\begin{pmatrix} 9 & -2 \\ -7 & 4 \end{pmatrix}\), then |Q| is  = 9 x 4 - (-2) x (-7) = 36 - 14  = 22

question_text: If the hypotenuse of a right-angled isosceles triangle is 2cm , what is the area of the triangle?
subject: mathematics
explanation: sin45o = \(\frac{y}{2}\) y = 2 sin45o y = 2 (\(\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\)) y = \(\frac{2}{\sqrt{2}}\) x \(\frac{\sqrt{2}}{\sqrt{2}}\) y = \(\frac{2\sqrt{2}}{2}\) y = \(\sqrt{2}\) Since it is an isosceles triangle  x = \(\sqrt{2}\) Area of \(\Delta\) = \(\frac{1}{2}\)bh = \(\frac{1}{2}\) x \(\sqrt{2}\) x \(\sqrt{2}\) = \(\frac{1}{2}\) x 2 = 1 cm2

question_text: The distance travelled by a particle from a fixed point is given as s = (t3 - t2 - t + 5)cm. Find the minimum distance that the particle can cover from the fixed point.
subject: mathematics
explanation: S = (t3 - t2 - t + 5)cm \(\frac{ds}{dt}\) = 3t2 - 2t - 1 = (3t + 1)(t - 1) t = -\(\frac{1}{3}\) or t = 1 Substitute value of t  s = (13 - 12 - 1 + 5)cm = 4.0 cm

question_text: If x = {n2+1:n is a positive integer and 1 \(\leq\) n \(\leq\) 5}, y = {5n:n is a positive integer and 1 \(\leq\) n \(\leq\) 5}, find x \(\cap\) y.
subject: mathematics
explanation: X = {n2+1:n is a positive integer and 1 \(\leq\) n \(\leq\) 5}Implies X = {2, 5, 10, 17, 26} i.e. put n= 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5Y = {5n:n is a positive integer and 1 \(\leq\) n \(\leq\) 5}Put X = 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5Y = {5, 10, 15, 20, 25}X \(\cap\) Y = {2, 5, 10, 17, 26} \(\cap\) {5, 10, 15, 20, 25}= {5, 10}

question_text: I.S∩T∩W=S II. S∪T∪W=SIII. T∩W=SIf S⊂T⊂W, which of the above statements are true?
subject: mathematics
explanation: S∩T∩W = S(This means that all the elements of s are in T and also in W.)S∪T∪W = W (imply W is a universal set for S and T) T∩W = S  imply all the elements of S are in T and W)  S ⊂ T ⊂ W∴ I, II, and III

question_text: A polynomial in x whose roots are 4/3 and -3/5 is
subject: mathematics
explanation: If 4/3 and -3/5 are roots of a polynomial Imply x = 4/3 and - 3/53x = 4 and 5x = -3∴3x-4 = 0 and 5x+3 = 0 are factors(3x-4)(5x+3) = 0 product of the factors 15x2 + 9x – 20x – 12 = 0 By expansion15x2 - 11x – 12 = 0

explanation: In Δ TYXXY = TY ∴y =47\(^{\circ}\) base ∠s of ISCΔBut y+x+34+47 = 180 interioropposite ∠s are supplementary47 + x + 34 + 47 = 180x + 128= 180x = 180- 128x = 52\(^{\circ}\)

explanation: ∫sec2θ dθ = ∫ 1/cos2 dθ∫(cos)-2 dθ,let u = cos θ∴∫u-2 = 1/u + c∫cos θ = sin θ + c∫sec-2θ = 1/u sin θ + c= (sinθ / cosθ) + c= Tan θ + c
